content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in the front seat of a vehicle going west on i-70 in pennsylvania.We were leaving the bedford area traveling towards pittsburgh,pennsylvania.I was looking out of the front window when i saw a brilliant object in the sky,descending then hovering  off to the left.I looked at this for approximately a minute when i realized my mind could not identify what i was viewing. i turned to tell driver and asked "what is that?" "look,what is that?" i pointed towards the front left windshield out into the sky.
the driver looked at this large reflective object and couldn't answer.The witness in the back seat couldn't identify it either.This object appeared reflective in nature and mirrored like with a brilliant glowing aura.I felt it was morphing into shape before my eyes.It descended as an oval,then hovered turning into more of an orb shaped object.I said to the others in the vehicle,"omg it's a ufo" after no one had any identifiable responses to what we were observing.The driver said,"take your camera out".I didn't turn my phone camera on because i didn't want to look away and miss something.
this object did not make any sound.This object dissipated,then reappeared. it moved from the left side of the windshield towards the front quickly and over a range until gone.We saw and heard two jets near by afterwards in the sky flying together crisscrossed then left the area.This object did not resemble any aircraft,balloon or blimp that i have ever seen before in my life.
content.summary: I was a passenger in the front seat of a vehicle going west on i-70 when i saw a mirrored metallic object in the sky descending then hovering,while it appeared to morph into shapes. this object then took flight quickly moving in another directio.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1:30 am, and i was watching television unwinding from an evening job. warm clear night, and i had my porch door open, where i occasionally step outside. got tired of channel surfing so got up to poke my head out the back door. walked to the end of the deck and watched a white light appear, first thinking it was an incoming jet. there's a nearby airport but flights usually don't arrive this time of the morning. the light grew  larger and brighter but remained in its location. i thought maybe it was the moon popping through a slight cloud. no, it would've been far southwest that time of the morning. i was looking almost due east at something that purely baffled me. i grabbed my phone a took a pic, then a short video clip. there was no noise from the object, i was far enough away to have heard anything. after getting the video clip with my phone i watched it for another few seconds, and then the thing was gone. it disappeared as though a light switch had been shut off. i think i walked in and out of my house ten times looking at the sky and trying to wrap my mind around what i had just witnessed. no, it wasn't the planet venus. many people have seen the video i have, and nobody has an answer, not even the doctor who lives next door to me. the pixilation on my phone camera is fairly decent, but after watching this clip repeatedly i remain bewildered. close up it looked to turn yellow-orange with what might be a heat signature.
content.summary: Thought it was an incoming jet, but it was stationary, then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was working the evening shift on a natural gas drilling rig in pennsylvania.  it was approximately 3 am in the morning, i was changing the oil on a air compressor.  i am not sure why to this day, but it was as if something had wanted me to turn around and lookup to see its' presence.  i went leaning over the air compressor, and turned to my right.  i saw what could only to be explained as the brightest, and most brilliant white light i've ever seen in the sky.  it was coming over the tree-line atop the mountains.  the evening was clear, no clouds, and the stars were quite visible.  the object was brilliant and quite large in size, the distance from my view point would have been a mile or so based on the distance of the mountains it came over.  the light i had seen would be moving towards me from the west to the north.  it would be moving, and while moving it would become brighter, extremely bright and then dim out quickly.  only to be dim for approximately three seconds, and then illuminate back to its' original brightness.  then it would repeat the same pattern as before, bright then extremely bright, and then dim out completely. this happened approximately four to six times.  the last time it was it's original brightness, and then changed direction abruptly and shooting straight up and disappearing at a phenomenal speed. i had not seen the object again.  i have a witness, who was my boss at that time.  he had come around the corner after the first time i had noticed the light.  i pointed it out to him, we both watched as it went through the transformations the four to six times and then disappeared. i have spoken to him about this since it had happened, and he does not like talking about it.  i have come forth, only because this is the second time i have seen nearly the identical object, and same pattern of being brilliant white, then becoming extremely bright and dimming out only to be a further distance away before illuminating again.  there were no f.A.A. lights on this object, no other aircraft in the vicinity, and no sounds were emitted from this object. the other time i had seen almost identically the same incident, was in north pitcher, ny approximately 8 months ago while sitting on my friends back deck of his house.  i could sketch out the scenario, as i draw/paint quite a bit.  giving approximations on flight patterns, size during original illumination, and size when it had become more brilliant before disappearing several times crossing half the horizon in distance within 40-45 seconds.
content.summary: Brilliant white , brightest thing i've seen in the sky in my lifetime. speed was remarkable

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this object several times a week for a couple months now. only in mornings between 5 am and 7 am. its always in the same spot. it doesnt move at all. just sits there. usually for an hour and then its gone. i managed to get a couple photos..And light next to the object was not seen in real life. only captured on photo. when i see it.. i have feelings of being relaxed. and i cant stop looking at it.
content.summary: Round silver very bright. small like a star but very bright. seen several times.

content.detailedDescription: I have video but will send later. my uncle was sitting outside of my house parked in his car at about 6am on either september 15th or 16th 2015. he saw a cigar shaped orb with a triangle at the top. he didn't understand what he was looking at, but by the time he decided to record it, which he did, the object got smaller and smaller or it moved further away. he stopped recording because his own eyes had a better perception of what he saw as popes to the pictures i'm going to send and the video in my possession. he contemplated if it were a star or the moon but the moon never looks that small and it was to bright to be a star.
content.summary: Sitting in car looking out window observed cigar shape with triangle at the top and orb lights.

content.detailedDescription: I have video but will send later. my uncle was sitting outside of my house parked in his car at about 6am on either september 15th or 16th 2015. he saw a cigar shaped orb with a triangle at the top. he didn't understand what he was looking at, but by the time he decided to record it, which he did, the object got smaller and smaller or it moved further away. he stopped recording because his own eyes had a better perception of what he saw as popes to the pictures i'm going to send and the video in my possession. he contemplated if it were a star or the moon but the moon never looks that small and it was to bright to be a star.
content.summary: Sitting in car looking out window observed cigar shape with triangle at the top and orb lights.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was outside drinking juice excessiveley like usual when these crazy lights shined everywhere and i went temporariliy blind when i became unblind they landed on my dog ramòne and killed him i was so sad i cried for 13 minute while they came out of there ship and where like yo we come in peace do you party bro? they then handed me a biscut and inate it and passed out, when i woke up i was missing my kidney
content.summary: It came down

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the balcony of my hotel room.  5th floor faces north towards the angeles mountain range. i saw a reflection in the clouds which circulated like a spotlight but no light trail. along with that was a blinking light in the trees which randomly blinked,  but at times was in synch with the circulating  light.  there are multiple airports in the area, i wasn't really sure what i was looking at.  when i replayed the first recording, i noticed something, which at first i thought was a dust or a bug, shoot from the ground into the sky and vanish.  i had to replay in slow motion several times.  so much going on in this video that i can't figure out.  either i witnessed several ufos or nothing at all.  hoping someone can help me determine this. there are 2 videos and several screen shots from the video.
content.summary: Something shot out of the mountain into the sky, left side of video.Circulating light later

content.detailedDescription: Driving home late around midnight on hurricane shoals rd.,  what i thought were stadium lights caught my eye to the south over rabbit hill park. but i immediately noticed it was not stadium lights. there was a rectangualr beam of white light made up of 6 extremely bright lights coming from a stationary craft which was obscured by the brightness of the lights. it shone in a straight beam rather than a cone shape. it was too high to be stadium lights. the lights were brighter than any lights i had ever seen. i slowed down and continued to observe. the beams were projected toward the ground at a slight angle. there was no sound. i continued to look at it, trying to figure out what it was and suddenly the beams shifted. i continued to watch and drive until trees got in my way. at that point i immediately turned my car around so i could go back and get a better look. no sooner had i turned around, the object was gone. no lights, no nothing. it was gone within 5 seconds.  i had goose bumps all over and raced home to get my brother. the goose bumps would not go away! we both went back to the park and drove around trying to figure out what it was or to see if we could see it again.
content.summary: Observed bright beams of light over park

content.detailedDescription:
I was five years old, living in pennsylvanian with my family.  my parents where sitting in front of the tv watching the news on the launching of the men into space going to the moon for the first time.  i went out side to play with my friend.  it was a nice sunny day and we were playing on the swing set when i looked up and saw an object far, far away and climbing up in the sky.  i thought that had to be the rocket taking off so i told my friend and we both started waving to it like kids do, just having fun and laughing when the objects seemed to see us and the little bit of light got bigger and bigger as it came across the sky from high up to hovering right in front of us.  the next thing i remember is telling my friend that one of us should run in and tell my parents.  we argued in front of it for a few minutes then i lost the fight, turned around to run and told her to watch the thing and not to let it go anywhere until i got back with my parents.  later she said that as soon as i began to run back to the house, the thing took off straight up in the air and disappeared.  the next day our neighbor came over with the new paper and was talking to my mother, the thing was the main article of the paper, it said that everyone in that area saw it and she said "look, their saying it took a diagonal path across the entire county and ended up here.  isn't that your back yard?"
    i have long since moved away from pennsylvanian, my friend remembers nothing and i have been plagued by "them" ever since.
content.summary: I waved down a ufo when i was five and multiple sightings ever since.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking towards the sky nearing sunset and took a picture, then saw in the photo a blue orbs but i couldnt see it?  then i shot some more shots and it appears to me moving and hoovering?  it then dissapeared into the clouds as you can see, so i ruled our it had to do with some light reflection from my camera.

then my friend also shot some pics the same time pretty much but he was looking at the rainbow at the time the opposite way from me, he has caught two anomolies in his rainbow pics!
content.summary: See detail part

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a field, flying my rc plane. the day before, i captured about 4-5 of these orbs. i went back to the field, the next day to see if anymore were about.
i thought the objects were spirit orbs of some sort. because i never see them until i played back what i recorded.
this orb checks my rc plane out. in one frame, it splits into three, then changes direction.
did not notice these orbs straight away, while viewing what i had recorded.
it felt good lol
they couldn't be seen with the naked eye, only on my gopro hero 3 white action cam, picked them up.
i have more but this one is interesting, because it goes for my rc plane.
there is what appears to be a spark, before i launch my plane. travels round the front of the plane. 

cam used, my old bashed up gopro hero 3 white.

1st orb, heading into chem-cloud: 00:12.

orb that checks my underpowered, crash and smash plane: 02:16.

vapour trail seems to appear? 04:27.

direction for bing or google maps. uk. carpenders park, little oxhey lane to oxhey lane. then follow two pylons and that's the field i was in.

thanks loads mr. crapo. you have the best ufo show out there.
content.summary: White orb, checks out my rc plane.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband noticed a bright light shining from outside thru the blinds. 
hovered for a long time in one location. it seemed to move super slow in the general areas. 
later a plane passes heading to the dfw airport. 
i did get a few pictures and short video. 
the object moved slowly traveling eastward and seem to hoover as well. slowly moved more. this was all north of hwy 380 in mckinney due north east and then east of our backyard. 
 hovered in this location over an hour then moved slowly back north  
it's still there , haven lost sight. 
in awe really. would live to see it closer and or figure out what it is. 

the video i have is on my husbands phone. sharing the picture i took from my phone.
content.summary: Just kept seeing bright light. brighter than anything in the sky. angeled above our neighbors roof.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette looking at the sky as i normally do when i observed a light in the sky.At first i thought it was a satalite untill it stopped dead in its path ,then changed direction and came to hover ten to fifty miles away in  the sky.(hard to tell how far away exactly ) i then went to get my binoculars to get a better look.Came back outside and looked thru binoculars there was a triangle craft with red green and whites lights flashing in no particular pattern. i continued to c these craft over the next three or four days. i then showed my mother and she was frightened by it so i left that alone. i then informed a friend of mine and he came to my rural home to observe with me as they where coming every night and he was as intrested as me.That night therre were four craft in the sky we watched them zip around almost like they are swimming around the night sky for two or three hours.They were acending and decending moving around in many different directions and patterns throughout that time.We grew weary of watching after a few hours and were about to go inside when we seen a light coming from the northeast we bthen noticed it was being follwed the craft quickly dissapeared but the jet following it was quite close so i shined my flashlight at it then shone my beam strait in the sky.At this point the jet that had been following the craft came strait at us it flew rite over my house just above the trees..I then had no doubt it was a military fighter plane which i have never seen in this area in my life.The next day there was a newscast on ctv winnipeg talking about the strange lights in the sky over northwestern ontario.They claimed they were testing search and rescue probes out of shilo military base in manitoba.(i live very near the manitoba ontario border) but i do not beleive these were any craft that we have in our military or at least nothing the public has ever heard of..These craft manuvere so quickly and change direction instantly without slowing at all.When the leave they dissapear across the sky instantly.These craft continue to be seen on most clear nights,they were never here before .I have ben interested in ufology for a long time so i watch the skies constantly and these are a new phenomena for me .If your organization had anyone in my area im sure someone with high definition cameras and telescopes or something like that could come and get close up photographic evidence as they seem to sit in the sky at a distance on most nights for the last three weeks or so. i also know of another man who has been seeing orbs thru this same time period.He claims they are coming within ten to twenty feet of him on a regular basis ,he has taken some photographs of them as well. we would appreciate any feedback from youyr organization on these sightimgs. tthere have been to many sightings for me to type them all out.Ive observed them so many times it dosent even surprise me anymore when i look into the night sky and see them there. i just expect them to be there now.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red white green lights triangle shape hovering ,moving around,seen several times over last three weeks including tonite

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting out side my house like we always used to ... every night we will sit out there and just dreamed about what we would do after we graduated high school, sometimes we will see an shoting star or a plane or satelite they all have the same path straight line, but that night was different we saw like 20 plus lights just flighing around then we saw this like missiles fire to each other there was like 20 plus objects in each side and it look like when they were showing the war in irag but live we were watching that me and my friend and we were like what the heck is that .. that lasted like 5 to 10 min there were no cameras or anything to record that at the time we were no that prevelige .. that was the first time we saw the lights . the second time we were at our local park in fron of the school and we were like 3 or 5 of us just laying on the benches watching the sky and my best friend was did you saw that and i was like what the light and then it was gone and then he was like there it is again and we saw the lighst going faster than you could point your finger across the sky changing direction from north to south to east to west it was crazy that lasted for about 5 min or so i dont know it was like 20 years ago t..
thanks for looking at my case or events i hope to hear from you
content.summary: Me and my friend were sitting outside our house as usual and we saw this bright lights unusual not shoting stars not satelites it look like they were having a wat or fight on the sky , but nothing was reported on the news next day not shoting stars or any

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside after a storm, the sky was a dark bluish color, but i noticed a beautiful brilliant white cloud. it looked out of place in its whiteness, so i ran inside to get my cellphone to get a picture. i love taking pictures of storm clouds, but when i saw the pictures i had taken, i was  very surprised at the yellow orange shape that came out behind the white cloud, as that had not been visible at all during my picture taking. i looked again and i still could not see it, but after snapping another picture, saw that it was still there.
content.summary: Object in sky behind brilliant white cloud. orange in color.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting up my telescope in radnor ohio at my sister's house when we saw this object.It was just starting to get dark and there was a little light from the sun setting so dusk i guess i should say.It looked like 4 or 5 cubes linked together in a horizontal line.They were glowing a white/green color.It was silent and kind of drifted quickly across the sky from the northwest to southeast.We thought it might have been the iss at first but it just did not look right to be the iss.Myself my sister and her daughter all 3 witnessed this object.It was totally silent and it did appear to have small structures on the top and rear or left end of the block shapes.The entire thing appeared to be glowing.It was not real bright but more like how a lamp shade looks when the lamp is on.
content.summary: 4 glowing white/green cubes in a horizontal line

content.detailedDescription: I was in galveston crystal beach putting up a small tent for my family and friends. we built the fire and sat down to enjoy the cool breeze. i threw a line in the water getting ready to fish when i came back to my chair i sat down and started sky watching. i started to joke to my friend about a bright star and said it was a ufo when he got up to check his fishing pole he told me to come here. he said the star moved up and down and in a circle we watched it for about 6 hours i got my phone and filmed it when i was watching the recording it look like a bright star blinking off and on but when i went back to look at the videos again it started to change colors. i had the feeling of scared and excited all at once. me and my friend decided to leave the beach. we left with it still inside its same spot over the water for 9 hours before we left.
content.summary: Look like a star but in video has different color

content.detailedDescription: It was a warm evening and i went outside in my rear garden to cool and have a coffee and i live under the flight path for stanstead airport and sometimes as they are coming into land the planes put their head/landing lights on, i could see this white light coming from the south west heading towards me and at first i thought it was a plane and it got nearer and nearer and i could not hear any engine noise and it was on a curved flight path at about a height of 800 to 1000 yards above me and as it reached me and was heading east a passenger plane coming from the south cut in front of it and just above it and i could get a scale of this light/ craft as about 15 to 20 feet across, it was like looking at a dazzling head light front and rear and side, it was travelling about the speed of a single engine prop plane but this was no plane and it flew off in approx an easterly direction just north of harlow essex, i tried reporting it to stanstead airport as a near miss but they just gave me a link and to date nothing heard, the passenger plane missed it by about 200 yards which i know is close in aviation terms, i was just shocked to see this thing flying past me and just froze and watched it disappear in some low cloud to the east.This was about 10 pm london time give or take a few minutes on sunday the 9th august 2015.
content.summary: Looked like a bright light about 15 to 20 foot across

content.detailedDescription:
1. enjoying nice evening front yard after national fireworks display finished on nat'l mall.  i could hear them, but they were not visible. shortly after when people had left the site, i saw a medium low altitude reddish/orange single light flying toward me from the direction of the westerly portion of the fireworks site. having seen this type of object two previous times, and also videotaped, i immediately recognized it, and was able to agioan use my videocam to capture it's transit and behavior. 

   this object is shaped similar to a cocktail olive on end, or an egg shaped with the narrow tip at the bottom. set into the base but fully mobile is a brilliant white light sphere which constantly moves around in a moving eye type of movement. the craft in which it's set also has the ability to tilt freely, with the ability to tilt to a full 90 degrees. this allows the sphere in the base to have great range of ...Whatever it's doing. i certainly do not know if it's beaming or receiving or both.  the most striking aspect is that none of these movement affect the smoothness of the flight line.   

as it drew closer, i realized it would come into close visual range of my projecting light into my big mirrored ball in my back yard. i use a decollimated laser with wide beam to illuminate it, and it's awesome. i stopped taping and quickly moved to the side front corner and projected into the mirrored ball, the result was the craft slowed and then made an instant 100 degree turn from north direction to west.  i then used my laser to make a quick pair of star shapes in the trees where it could be seen. i then resumed taping. the craft had slowed considerably, but as it moved to the west it turned its light down and then fully off. 

there were no nav lights indicating any terrestrially law-abiding craft. there was zero noise as usual. the light in the base was a thousand times too bright to have been some kind of candle or flame heat source to levitate some kind of lantern.  the estimated diameter is uniform for the 3 separate sightings i have had of these is about that of a school bus or even a metrobus.   on the 1st two sightings, there were three in a line, and each time the marines presidential helicopter unit's regular patrolling huey came into the area within a minute or two, plainly looking for them. on this 4th of july event. there was only one and no copter investigated. i mention this as there was a hyped terror threat for this 4th, but even with this substantial craft at low altitude flying up from the mass gathering on the mall no one cared. 

my impression after seeing other ufo types in these skies is that they seem extremely advanced, and in fact close frames seem to indicate some kind of possibly genetically engineered hull as it glows from the tremendous lower light and looks organic. 

i wasn't shocked but only excited as i had seen them twice before.  the craft turned its light out and sailed slowly off toward bethesda, md. the video after the three snips below is from the 1st appearance and the 2nd vid is of the event described.
content.summary: 3rd appearance , videotaped, cocktail olive shape brilliant moving spherical light in base

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my living room watching tv with my curtains open to see the clouds a thunderstorm is coming, and noticed a star i thought, but the clouds are out so you can't see them and right there a star impossible i said to myself then looking at it it started to zig zag left to right, i can't believe me eyes then it started going straight up i grabbed my phone to record it ran outside and it was gone
content.summary: Looked like a star but to cloudy for stars then zigzag and went straight up

content.detailedDescription: Had an incredible sighting today. at 2:00pm i was driving in s.E. rochester heading west down a hill with my brother. i happened to look off to my left side and saw a huge black arrowhead shaped craft. my brother saw it at the same moment. it was larger than a commercial jet. it was hovering and not making any noise. it was a totally clear day and i would not be surprised to see others report on it. it was just there in the sky and so easy to see. if you looked up there is no way you could miss it. i could not pull over as i had traffic behind me. after looking at it for about 10 seconds trees started to obstruct my view. by the time i got back in the clear it was gone. the time i lost site of it was about a minute. the craft was flat black and did not reflect the sun at all. on the top going down the side was large ridges that were evenly spaced out. from my angle to it i saw the back left side. at first i thought it was a triangle shape but it was slightly angled so i could see the back was cut out. i suppose you could say it was boomerang but it was much thicker and more arrowhead. it was stationary and did not move at all. it was so crystal clear of a sighting that i am still in awe. i did not see how the craft left.
content.summary: Large black arrowhead shaped craft hovering.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i was coming home on the morning of september 19th 2015 roughly 530 am i was riding passenger noticed bright white light in the corner of sight ask friend to pull over after pulling over noticed it was silent hovering  i took my cell phone and took a picture we got in car drove a mile or so then pulled over watched it dim then brighten then disappeared
content.summary: Seen bright white light pulled over took pictures silent hovering dimmed rebrighten then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was cigar shaped with a sphere on its end. the color was white. made no noise and was moving from west to east. it was very high n far away. so was huge. i would say it was 3 times the size of a airliner. moved across the skye in a minute or two. was the only ufo i've ever seen.
content.summary: Cigar shape with sphere on its end

content.detailedDescription: Okay i went outside everynight to lay in the backyard to meatate. my second night i got abducted by a triangle shape air craft with i bright beem.They started to talk to me. an told me i wouldnt rember anything when they droped me off. they were tall sliver ish in color they talk to me for the next week telling me what time to go outside they told me were to meet them an everyone had to be asleep. i would go outside an bout 10 mins of being outside they would pick me up. i have werid signs on my stomach that are very strange they look like scars but there cuming through my skin everywere an more keep cpming up on my body. im starting to also have bruses an bumps in stright lines pop up on me. my last time i went out there an met them was bout last week when i asked them to plz let me see my daughter wich i didnt know i had an i got to meet the mother she was on there then they told me to tell the goverment a very important message but i cant tell anyone but the goverment they wonted an told me to realy a message for them i messaged the pentagon the white house an talked to the lummiate. i havent been takein to them cause i told thwm i wonted to meet my daughter an i was done getting abducted. an i still talk to them palapathicaly. now when i go lay outside i see bout 20-25 pairs of gloweing whit/gold color an one took a picture i think cause i started not being able to see an i woke up all the way down the street in a filed. thats what bein happying to me. they wont me to come outside tonight at 2:42.
content.summary: Abducted 4 nites in a row. werid markings an they keep appearing they talk to me in my head

content.detailedDescription:
I enjoy watching for meteors, the stars and looking for satellites.  at 5:20 a.M., thur., 17 sep 2015, i was watching for satellites and noticed two (2) bright lights which i thought were bright stars and even muttered to myself, "where'd you two guys come from"?

i observed two (2) very bright "stars" which after staring at them for a few seconds, realized that they were moving through the sky.  i observed these two (2) lights for a total of 20 to 30 seconds.  as they got to approximately 80 degrees from the horizon, they instantly "shut off".  i continued to watch because given their flight path, in another 5 seconds or so, they would have been directly overhead.

after waiting 2 to 3 minutes and not seeing them again, i ran and got my i-phone to take a compass reading which revealed that they were approximately 319-320 degrees nw (from my location using north as the reference point).

absolutely no sound and as stated, they instantly turned off as though someone had thrown a light switch.  the only thing i had was my zippo lighter and the distance between the two objects was approximately the width of my zippo lighter held out at arms length (approximately 24" outstretched arm).

conditions were: crystal clear night and still total darkness at that time of the morning (0520 hours).  there were absolutely no clouds in the sky.  i am 100% assured that i was not witnessing a jetliner nor any other type of recognized aircraft as again, these objects had the  brightness of the brightest stars in the sky.

please note that the two (2) lights were 'one-behind-the-other" and as i held up my zippo lighter as a reference of the distance between the two (2) objects (sideways, at arms length), they stayed in perfect alignment during my entire observation.  unfortunately, i was unable to ascertain their height/distance away from me.  additionally, i could not tell if the objects was a single object with lights at the front or back, but based on my 20 to 30 seconds of viewing, they again maintained perfect alignment, i.E. one-behind-the-other.

my feelings immediately after viewing these two objects was one of "i know what i saw, but i don't know what i saw" - unfortunately, i don't know how else to better explain it than that.  but i know that what i saw was again, not a normally recognized aircraft as my feelings are that the objects had to have been very large and at a great distance.  thank you for the opportunity to report this!
content.summary: 2 bright starlike lights slowly moving from northwest to southeast

content.detailedDescription: Outside my house having a cigarette, at around 23:30 0n 21st sept 2015 looked up and saw a red streak in the sky - a red object in the sky with a red trail moving very fast which got so far and then just vanished - it moved so fast it gave the impression of an arrow, the whole thing only lasted a few seconds but i am certain of what i saw and it was not the usual air traffic we get around here
content.summary: Red streak accross the sky that just dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9:30-10pm i was driving westbound on maitland blvd with my son in the passenger seat. it was a fairly clear night with a small amount of cloud cover, but you could still see some stars. we pulled up and stopped at the redlight at the intersection of maitland blvd and maitland ave. while at the redlight, i was looking up at the sky/stars out of my driverside window, when i noticed 3 bright red lights in a triangle shape that appeared to be hovering directly diagonal from me above the intersection. there is a jewish private school on that side of the intersection, and the object appeared to be hovering pretty much over the school probably less than 100ft above it. when i saw the object, i immediately rolled my window all the way down to get a clear view and also asked my son if he saw the object. and he said he saw it too. i first that it may have been a blimp because i did not hear any noise or airplane/helicopter motors running and it was kind of drifting/hovering. it was not a blimp because there was no large balloon above the lights that was visible. furthermore the 3 red lights were spread over a large area. a blimp's lights would be closer together i believe. the object appeared to be very large and had a dark outline of a triangle with the 3 red lights being the triangle points. it was large enough to black out the stars in the sky in that area.
furthermore, once the light turned green, i drove off very slowly still keeping an eye on the object which did not appear to be moving through the sky, only hovering in the area. there were also at least 4-5 cars that were driving in the opposite direction that had pulled off into the median to observe the object. there were multiple people outside of the cars looking up at it, pointing at it, and also some with their phones out probably taking pictures. 
we continued down the road, both puzzled about what we just saw, trying to make sense of it. we reached our destination and i told my friends about what we just saw. all i could tell them was that it was definitely an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: My son and i were driving and stopped at a stoplight. i saw a triangle with 3 red lights out of my driverside window that was hovering in 1 spot.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my kitchen when a bright lite caught my eye, so i ran an got my camcorder an ran outside an up the hill as i was filming..I was screaming to our neighbours come out side an see what iam seeing..As i was filming at the end i lost focus as it sailed out of sight arcoss the trees..
content.summary: Iwas in my kitchen when a bright light caught my eye, so i ran an got my camcorder an ran up the hill to get a better look at it.Then i filmed it as it was moveing across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went to sleep, and then all of a sudden i found myself in my living room, with a very creepy feeling. i remember thinking,oh no, they are here again.I tried to hide from them in the bathroom, but they were in there and there were strange red lights in there with me. all of a sudden, i was in my kitchen and there were 2 or 3 little men there in white jumpsuits, about 3 and a half feet tall. they actually seemed friendly, and i was no longer scared, although it was still very weird. it seemed real, and dreamlike at the same time. i then felt like i wanted to look out the window. it was then that i saw the craft hovering about 15 feet outside the window. and then, it was morning.
content.summary: Weird feeling, afraid, i knew they were there, i saw them in my apt., and then saw craft
